paramInformation.label: LED frame colour when moving
paramInformation.description: This parameter defines the LED colour when the motor is running.

paramInformation.label: LED frame – colour when not moving
paramInformation.description: This parameter defines the LED colour when the device motor is not running.

paramInformation.label: LED frame – brightness
paramInformation.description: This parameter allows to adjust the LED frame brightness.

paramInformation.label: Buttons orientation
paramInformation.description: This parameter allows reversing the operation of the buttons.

paramInformation.label: Outputs orientation
paramInformation.description: reversing the operation of Q1 and Q2

paramInformation.label: Alarm configuration - 1st slot
paramInformation.description: Which alarm frames and how the device should react

paramInformation.label: Alarm configuration - 2nd slot
paramInformation.description: which alarm frames and how the device should react

paramInformation.label: Alarm configuration - 3rd slot
paramInformation.description: which alarm frames and how the device should react

paramInformation.label: Alarm configuration - 4th slot
paramInformation.description: which alarm frames and how the device should react

paramInformation.label: Alarm configuration - 5th slot
paramInformation.description: which alarm frames and how the device should react

paramInformation.label: Alarm configuration – duration
paramInformation.description: duration of alarm sequence

paramInformation.label: First button – scenes sent
paramInformation.description: which actions result in sending scene IDs

paramInformation.label: Second button – scenes sent
paramInformation.description: which actions result in sending scene IDs

paramInformation.label: Power reports – include self-consumption
paramInformation.description: power measurements include device itself

paramInformation.label: Power reports – on change
paramInformation.description: minimal change in measured power to report

paramInformation.label: Power reports – periodic
paramInformation.description: reporting interval for measured power

paramInformation.label: Energy reports – on change
paramInformation.description: minimal change in measured energy to report

paramInformation.label: Energy reports – periodic
paramInformation.description: This reporting interval for measured energy

paramInformation.label: Force calibration
paramInformation.description: Set 2 to force device into calibration mode

paramInformation.label: Operating mode
paramInformation.description: This parameter allows adjusting operation ac-cording to the connected device.

paramInformation.label: Venetian blind – time of full turn of the slats
Set slats back to previous position
paramInformation.description: slats positioning in various situations

paramInformation.label: Delay motor stop after reaching end switch
paramInformation.description: time after which the motor will be stopped after contacts closed

paramInformation.label: Motor operation detection
paramInformation.description: Power threshold interpreted as reaching a limit switch.

paramInformation.label: Time of up movement
paramInformation.description: time needed for roller blinds to reach the top

paramInformation.label: Time of down movement
paramInformation.description: time needed for roller blinds to reach the bottom
